name: Speedway Challenge
description:
Are you ready for the challenge? Become a league champion or win classic challenges to gain SCP points for which you can unlock new tracks and teams.
3 game modes:
- league mode
- challenges mode - classic match or competition
- quick game mode - friendly match between 2 or 4 teams or individual tournament

Key features in league mode:
- 6 main leagues - polish, british, swedish, danish, german and french
- club budget - manage your finances to avoid debit and club relegation
- injures
- transfers - negotiate with other team riders and free agents
- rider contracts
- advanced rider stats
- variable rider skills during season
- compete in league mode for many years (no year limit)
- exact league rules for every available league
- real riders flow (transfers between clubs, new juniors, old riders retirements)
- create own team

Key game features:
- realistic riding model
- configurable camera view (zoom in, zoom out)
- 94 teams (league, national and classic teams)
- 739 riders (each with different riding level)
- 49 tracks with different riding model
- 3 difficulty levels

Like us and be up to date with news on our fb fanpage: www.facebook.com/SpeedwayChallenge
